S.FORM: Kaviyangan i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Kaviyangan. u kasalumaluma' nu Kaviyangan sa, 185 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 761 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 721 ku tademaw, pakalatu 95 . u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 40 ku tademaw, pakalatu 5 . u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 92 , Amis 1 , zumazuma 2 . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
